title: Twitter says it will restrict access to some tweets before Turkey’s election
description: Twitter says it will restrict access to some tweets before Turkey's election. The move comes as the country’s right-wing leader, President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, faces a tight contest at the polls on Sunday.

title: Is it time to upgrade your smartphone? Our quiz can help you decide.

title: Trust linked to porn-friendly bank could gain a stake in Trump’s Truth Social
description: But neither Trump Media nor the SPAC that has proposed merging with it has revealed that to the SEC or the SPAC's shareholders.

title: An influencer’s AI clone will be your girlfriend for $1 a minute
description: Launched this week, CarynAI is a chat bot leveraging GPT-4 API technology to replicate Caryn Marjorie's voice, mannerisms, and personality.
